transcript:
Customer: Ji sir.
Executive: Sir maine senior se baat ki hai, mai aapko reply de dungi.
Customer: Nahi nahi mujhe aapke senior se hi baat karni hai, aap hi baat kar rahi thi mujhse?
Executive: Haan mai wahi bol rahi hu na, ki maine apne senior se baat ki hai. Aap abhi abhi, aapka naam kya hai madam?
Customer: Muskaan baat kar rahi hu.
Executive: Okay madam, aap senior se baat karaiye abhi ke abhi.
Executive: Haan mai baat karati hu. Conference pe leke baat karaiye, mujhe call transfer kijiye abhi ke abhi.
Executive: Sir mai aapko 5 se 10 minute baad hi call karungi.
Customer: No no no no no, nahi nahi nahi madam nahi, mujhe abhi karna hai, mujhe abhi paas time nahi hai, mujhe abhi call transfer kijiye.
Executive: Sir abhi woh available nahi hai, toh mai aapki kaise baat karau, aap mujhe batao. Aap mujhe 5-10 minute do.
Customer: Abhi inse do ghante pehle bhi yahi bola gaya tha, aadhe ghante me back call aa jayega. Mujhe paas time pe baat kiya tha.
Customer: No no no no no madam.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to speak to the senior executive.



Resolution:

- Executive said she will call back in 5-10 minutes.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved. None.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Annoyed



@@@Key Topics:

- senior executive, call transfer, availability
